name: Master of Orion: Trilarian Shoal
summary: An iconic race from Master of Orion II has returned to conquer the stars! The eldritch Trilarian join the original 10 races with their own emperors and advisors, new ship hulls and blueprints, and unique perks and personalities. The whole galaxy welcomes their arrival, just in time to face the return of the nefarious Antarans.
